Basics

Source: vignettes/tutorial/basics_calcFeature.Rmd
basics_calcFeature.Rmd

calcFeature

library(fxtract)
df = data.frame(id = c(rep(1, 10), rep(2, 10)))
df$task = rep(c(rep("task1", 5), rep("task2", 5)), 2)
df$hour = rep(c(rep("hour1", 3), rep("hour2", 2), rep("hour1", 2), rep("hour2", 3)), 2)
df$x = rnorm(20)
df
##    id  task  hour           x
## 1   1 task1 hour1 -1.21696877
## 2   1 task1 hour1  0.62560736
## 3   1 task1 hour1  1.01383921
## 4   1 task1 hour2  0.51789736
## 5   1 task1 hour2 -0.74536184
## 6   1 task2 hour1 -0.81575512
## 7   1 task2 hour1  0.88365694
## 8   1 task2 hour2 -1.83865451
## 9   1 task2 hour2  0.38077977
## 10  1 task2 hour2  0.16940866
## 11  2 task1 hour1 -0.09922054
## 12  2 task1 hour1  1.30678658
## 13  2 task1 hour1 -0.53040864
## 14  2 task1 hour2  0.73405378
## 15  2 task1 hour2 -2.22512017
## 16  2 task2 hour1  2.12488410
## 17  2 task2 hour1  0.89777149
## 18  2 task2 hour2  0.27710333
## 19  2 task2 hour2 -0.34231626
## 20  2 task2 hour2  0.36335813

return 1 value each

max_x = function(data) {
  max(data$x)
}
calcFeature(df, group_col = "id", fun = max_x)
##   id    max_x
## 1  1 1.013839
## 2  2 2.124884

return more values at once

more_features = function(data) {
  data.frame(max_x = max(data$x), sd_x = sd(data$x))
}
calcFeature(df, group_col = "id", fun = more_features)
##   id    max_x      sd_x
## 1  1 1.013839 0.9786341
## 2  2 2.124884 1.1788665

group by two columns

calcFeature(df, group_col = c("id", "task"), fun = more_features)
##   id max_x_task1 max_x_task2 sd_x_task1 sd_x_task2
## 1  1    1.013839   0.8836569   0.963904  1.0842847
## 2  2    1.306787   2.1248841   1.356132  0.9275746

group by three colums

calcFeature(df, group_col = c("id", "task", "hour"), fun = more_features)
##   id max_x_task1_hour1 max_x_task1_hour2 max_x_task2_hour1
## 1  1          1.013839         0.5178974         0.8836569
## 2  2          1.306787         0.7340538         2.1248841
##   max_x_task2_hour2 sd_x_task1_hour1 sd_x_task1_hour2 sd_x_task2_hour1
## 1         0.3807798        1.1917994        0.8932591        1.2016658
## 2         0.3633581        0.9607346        2.0924520        0.8676996
##   sd_x_task2_hour2
## 1        1.2249411
## 2        0.3849452
